item.title: APU Battery Charger – Airplanes without Main/APU Battery Tie System

numlitem.para: APU battery charger is deactivated or removed, and

If the battery charger is removed, the weight and balance effect is negligible. If both the battery and the charger are removed, the weight unit correction is -100.2. Subtract 100 lbs. from the ZFW and TOW. Subtract 0.2 MAC Units from the ZFW CG and TOW CG, then verify the aircraft is still within CG limits.

note.para: An auto-generated ACARS message requesting an in flight APU start should be disregarded.

placard.para: Placard APU Control Panel "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Open and collar APU BAT CHGR circuit breaker (B5) at P37 panel.
Open and collar APU BAT CHGR circuit breaker (E4) at the E6 rack.
